document_data.mainbody:
The Plague-mothers Children was a guild of Talona-worshiping thugs infesting Chondath and the Vilhon Reach in the .
The guild was once composed of crusaders dedicated to prolonging the Rotting War to earn Talonas favor. However, the guilds members degenerated over the years to an informal collection of cutthroats whose primary goal was running extortion schemes. They threatened to unleash the wrath of the Lady of Poison if they werent paid.
